Package scheduling.schedulingStrategies.optimization

Class LPOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduling.schedulingStrategies.optimization.LPOptimizer

  • public class LPOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a linear optimization problem for the optimization of the schedule during a DR event. For the solving process, the lp_solve libraries are used.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Constructor Detail

      • LPOptimizer

        public LPOptimizer​()

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleRelevantJobs

        public void scheduleRelevantJobs​(java.util.List<BatchJob> relevantJobs,
                                 int intervalStart,
                                 int intervalEnd,
                                 DC handledDC)
        Creates optimization problem, solves it, and subsequently adjusts the schedule according to the found solution.
        Parameters:
        relevantJobs - List of all jobs that are relevant for the optimization.
        intervalStart - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the schedule should be optimized starts.
        intervalEnd - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the schedule should be optimized ends.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that uses this solver belongs.

      • calculateJobRuntimeInInterval

        private int calculateJobRuntimeInInterval​(BatchJob job,
                                          int intervalStart,
                                          int intervalEnd)
        Parameters:
        job - Instance of BatchJob for which the runtime should be calculated.
        intervalStart - Simulation time step that represents the start of the interval that is optimized.
        intervalEnd - Simulation time step that represents the end of the interval that is optimized.
        Returns:
        The originally scheduled runtime of the BatchJob instance within the interval, which is framed by the two simulation time steps.

      • updateSums

        private void updateSums​(double[] powerConsumptionSums,
                        int[] nodeOccupationSums,
                        int intervalStart,
                        int intervalEnd,
                        BatchJob job)
